TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExceptionHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 扩展 类可以为 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 运行时内出现的未经处理的异常创建异常处理程序。

span.span: Extend the class to create an exception handler for unhandled exceptions that occur within the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展 类并重写 方法可以确定异常是否应终止应用程序。Extend the class and override the method to determine whether an exception should terminate the application. 然后创建自定义的新实例类并将其分配给静态或属性，然后创建 WCF 客户端或服务。Then create a new instance of your custom class and assign it to the static or property prior to creating WCF clients or services. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了重写 方法的 抽象类的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the abstract class that overrides the method. [!code-csharp[S_UEExceptionHandler#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEExceptionHandler#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/vb/module1.vb#0)] 下面的代码示例演示如何启用自定义`MyExceptionHandler`的 WCF 运行时内发生的未经处理异常。The following code example shows how to enable the custom `MyExceptionHandler` for unhandled exceptions that occur within the WCF runtime. [!code-csharp[S_UEExceptionHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEExceptionHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/vb/module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlwaysHandle As ExceptionHandler

summary.span: 获取处理所有异常的 的实例。

span.span: Gets an instance of that handles all exceptions.

value.span: 返回所有异常的 的 对象。

span.span: An object that returns for all exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Property AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler As ExceptionHandler

public: static property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序域的当前 实现。

span.span: Gets or sets the current implementation for the application domain.

value.span: 分配一个自定义 对象，该对象接收异步 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 线程上发生的未经处理的异常。

span.span: Assign a custom object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur on asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，属性是`null`，并在异步 WCF 线程上未经处理的异常终止应用程序。By default, the property is `null`, and unhandled exceptions on asynchronous WCF threads terminate the application. 将此属性设置为 对象可以接收这些异常并做出响应。Set this property to an object to receive and react to these exceptions. 如果在异步 WCF 线程上发生了未经处理的异常，但到达此处理程序，也可能妥协的应用程序域的状态。If an unhandled exception occurs on an asynchronous WCF thread and reaches this handler, the state of the application domain may be compromised. 不应返回`true`为这些例外。 should not return `true` for these exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HandleException(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

param.name: exception
param.span: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 运行时内发生并且可能会终止应用程序的异常。

span.span: The exception the occurred within the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime and which may terminate the application.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，如果已经处理了异常，则返回 ；或者，如果重新引发异常并且应用程序终止，则返回 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns if the exception has been handled, or if the exception should be rethrown and the application terminated.

returns.span: 如果异常已处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception has been handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果异常已处理，则 属性将返回 `true`。The property returns `true` if the exception has been handled. 如果该属性返回 `false` 或引发其他异常，则将重新引发原始异常。If it returns `false` or throws a different exception, the original exception is rethrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了重写 方法的 抽象类的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the abstract class that overrides the method. 下面的代码示例演示如何启用自定义`MyExceptionHandler`的 WCF 运行时内发生的未经处理异常。The following code example shows how to enable the custom `MyExceptionHandler` for unhandled exceptions that occur within the WCF runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Property TransportExceptionHandler As ExceptionHandler

public: static property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ TransportExceptionHandler { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序域的当前传输 实现。

span.span: Gets or sets the current transport implementation for the application domain.

value.span: 一个自定义 对象，该对象接收全局 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 传输内发生的未经处理的异常。

span.span: A custom object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur within the global [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] transports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，属性设置为的值，导致未经处理的异常中被忽略的 WCF 传输。By default, the property is set to the value of , causing unhandled exceptions within WCF transports to be ignored. 将此属性设置为 的实例可以接受这些异常并做出响应。Set this property to an instance of to receive and react to these exceptions. 如果未经处理的异常发生在全局 WCF 传输和到达此处理程序，则可能被泄露的应用程序域的状态。If an unhandled exception occurs within a global WCF transport and reaches this handler, there is a possibility that the state of the application domain is compromised. 可以返回`false`为这些例外，以使应用程序将被终止。 can return `false` for these exceptions to cause the application to be terminated.
